elements.caption: You found all informations on the OVMS-Hardware WebUI under Config
please type in your Vehicle ID, you found the ID on the WebUI of the OVMS-Hardware in Config -> Vehicle.
please type in your Username, you found it on the WebUI of the OVMS-Hardware in Config -> Server V3 (MQTT).
optional type in your Topic Prefix, you found it on the WebUI of the OVMS-Hardware in Config -> Server V3 (MQTT).
